Title: Love is in the Air
Description:
Smell these roses! My partner got them for me at the Gala of Gifts.

Interested in seeing things yourself? Head to Durotar. There are gifts, and food, and you should taste the chocolate, it's delicious!
ObjectivesText: Visit the Gala of Gifts in Durotar, near Rocktusk Farm.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak with Mahaja Cloudsong at the Gala of Gifts.
